DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 3 study ( Study 310 ) design determine compare efficacy safety 122-0551 Foam Vehicle Foam apply twice daily two week subject plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison 122-0551 Foam Versus Vehicle Foam Subjects With Plaque Psoriasis ( Study 310 )
